function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"The use of electric vehicles may contribute to urban sprawl and increased competition with public transport and shared services.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemic complicating efforts to realize a \\\\u2019just transition\\\\u2019.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of global society to disconnection bans and energy bill deferral.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases due to disrupted supply chains and altered social practices.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding the lasting impact of the pandemic on social and political practices, including telework, travel, and mobility.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global reduction in oil and natural gas demand due to covid-19.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High cost and technical complexity of transforming existing buildings for pandemic response can limit the feasibility of design interventions.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient space utilization in car parking configurations can impact the ability to repurpose parking spaces for public health needs during pandemics.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unused car parking spaces being repurposed for different activities could increase the risk of contagious disease transmission if proper precautions are not taken.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and temperature control in repurposed educational spaces could contribute to the spread of airborne pathogens and discomfort for occupants.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate hvac services leading to different comfort zones and potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of capacity regulations in educational buildings during covid-19 alert levels, potentially leading to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate protection of interior surfaces from water, heat, moisture, and abrasion, potentially leading to mold growth and indoor air quality issues.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transformation of car parking building to educational spaces may require adaptation of the building envelope for heat exchange control, posing a potential risk of improper ventilation and air circulation.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in illumination standards between car parking buildings and educational spaces poses a challenge in providing adequate lighting for the adapted spaces, increasing the risk of discomfort and potential safety hazards.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adapting the building envelope for heat exchange control and ventilation in educational spaces may face challenges in maintaining a comfortable indoor environment, especially in extreme climate zones.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient heat exchange control in building envelope leading to climate-related health risks.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of partition walls between parking bays allows for easy adaptation of large car parking areas into smaller educational spaces, potentially leading to overcrowding and congestion.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Right-angle parking configuration may lead to inefficient circulation and traffic flow within the adapted spaces, increasing congestion and reducing air quality.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate natural ventilation in academic buildings a, b, c, and workshop building d increases the risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient natural light in most rooms on the campus can impact the well-being of occupants and potentially compromise their immune systems, making them more susceptible to contagious diseases.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate interior finishing materials and lack of special installations in the car parking building may lead to poor hygiene conditions, increasing the risk of surface contamination and disease spread.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate space allocation for students and vehicles leading to overcrowding and congestion.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Congested academic and administrative buildings may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases due to close proximity and high occupancy.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate parking facilities and overhanging structures may lead to congestion and close contact among vehicle occupants, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate workshop facilities and limited space may impact the ability to implement proper hygiene and distancing measures, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High occupancy of built-up areas by car parking spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious disease transmission in parking facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding in parking spaces due to pandemic-related measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene facilities in car parking buildings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective safety and security measures in car parking buildings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate design of pedestrian passages in car parking areas","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of monitoring in parking areas leading to obstruction of circulation passages","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of secondary research approach from multiple countries increases the risk of introducing infectious disease-related guidelines or standards from high-risk areas.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adaptation proposal for car parking buildings may overlook the integration of infectious disease control measures, increasing the risk of inadequate protection against disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of social distancing measures in architectural design","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Forced reduction of quarantine period","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay or prevention of timely healthcare access due to technical solutions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conspiracy linking 5g and covid-19 leading to disrupted connectivity","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Technical literacy requirement for 5g solutions","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance and deterrence of health personnel from using new e-health systems","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited deployment of 5g networks and limited availability of 5g devices","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complexity and implementation issues of 5g devices, including power consumption and multi-band support","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incidents of destroying cellular base stations due to conspiracy theories linking 5g networks and the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased network congestion due to rapid deployment of new healthcare applications and increased number of 5g users","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in managing billions of miots generating ad hoc data transfers","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited connectivity challenges in 5g deployment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adversaries attacking databases with sensitive information pose security risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive connected devices increase the attack surface for unauthorized operations on the healthcare system.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Personal information disclosed in telemedicine sessions","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"}]}
